title: Maharashtra lowers petrol, diesel prices for the Mumbai region: Check details
selftext:
Maharashtra has lowered fuel prices in the Mumbai region by Rs 2 per litre for diesel and by 65 paise per litre for petrol, Deputy CM Ajit Pawar announced while presenting the state Budget on June 28.

Kya karengaye itni dhanrashi ka, Mumbaikars?
comments: Bhar lo be.. Ghar pe poora tank me... Sala kab badha de pata nhi..
